author: danceratopz
content:
Hi <@427903869226582018>  & <@508125616940515329>! I just rebased the eip-6780 branch with self destruct tests on main and refactored them to run on the new version of execution-spec-tests. It's still a work-in-progress, but it should be easy to pick up work on these tests again. Feel free to reach out if you have any questions! 

https://github.com/ethereum/execution-spec-tests/pull/122#issuecomment-1623472474

author: ralexstokes
content:
do you have the latest impl here in nethermind in a PR somewhere?

it looks like the builder code does at least (i) block validation (ii) payment validation

i was thinking it was only (i) where a cross-client interface is pretty straightforward to standardize on

we can likely do something similar for (ii) as well if there is client appetite to implement but i would personally want to spend some time thinking about the payment interface before pushing for any particular thing

if you can share how you approached the problem it would help inform how i think we should translate (i) + (ii) into some kind of standardized API
